text:
BOOKING.COM - Amsterdam, The Netherlands | Tel Aviv, Israel | ONSITE | VISA support and Relocation to Amsterdam

I am a mobile developer at Booking.com, the biggest accommodations site on this planet. We are looking to hire experienced people from anywhere in the world, and to relocate them to the beautiful city of Amsterdam to work with us.

Some of the positions available are:

* Software developer: http://grnh.se/g7y1iw1

* Software developer (Tel Aviv): http://grnh.se/wpvlai1

* Front end developer: http://grnh.se/ts8ixw1

* UX designer (HTML/CSS): http://grnh.se/6lwb5c1

* Data scientist (NLP): http://grnh.se/dy7eln1

* Data Scientist (ML): http://grnh.se/qfsd6e1

* Data Scientist (ML, Tel Aviv): http://grnh.se/yfehks1

* Product Owner for Data Science (Tel Aviv): http://grnh.se/lbrq641

Other job vacancies at http://grnh.se/30g5b71

I, for one, relocated earlier this year to the Netherlands to work at Booking as an iOS developer. If you have any questions about the process shoot me an email at com.gmail@{{username}}
